column4: *can someone please tell me, how i add users to proftpd, or is it new policy in ubuntu to be as unhelpful as possible*
*it would be nice to get ftp working to start with!!!!!!*
*i probably would if people here would take 3 seconds out of their life to give me one command*
*oh ffs*
yes
i dont want a tutoiral though, all i need  is how to add proftpd users so i can use ftp to chmod some files tso i can add packages ot my forum *weeping*
*i need help with ftpd
*i think am going to break the computer keyboard over my head in a minute*
i find it very hard to belive that all 12k users on here have no idea how to add proftpd users
cos all i want i one command
you have to edit a config file, i think
one litttle command
editing a config file isn't ahat hard
*that
i did google it
fine
i though u had logged thats all
i spent an afternoon explaining the problem to you, then i tought u had logged off, you will understand how frsutrating that would have been :)
yesh
what will that do?
I think it'll check for proftpd's startup script
